title: Mercenary

fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Outsider: You appear to not win with Order. Affects up to Uncertain checks. 
- Word of Mouth: All Chaos and Outsider Destructive will know you exist. You are able to send anonymous messages to them, and they may send messages to you. 
- Money-Driven: You may accept tasks given by Chaos or Outsider Destructives. Tasks must be a game related task, and cannot span more than 6 consecutive phases (the Host will reject any obviously unreasonable requests). You cannot drop a task once youâ€™ve accepted it. You may only have 2 tasks active at once. You must obtain both of your tasks before N3 ends, or else you Die at the end of the phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Knapsack: Gain a non-Special card of your choice. [4 uses]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Complete 2 tasks sent by Chaos and Outsider Destructive roles.

desc: *When you get a task from a Chaos/Outsider, you may choose to accept it. You cannot drop a task once you have accepted it. You may only have 2 tasks active at once. You must obtain both of your tasks before N3 ends, or else you will lose.*
